name: Choux
description: An adorable girl who wishes to become Suin
story: Choux is a Human child who was rescued from a cold, snowy mountain by an old Mouse Suin couple fifteen years ago. Having been adopted by the couple, she grew up as the only Human in her village.
get_line: Let me know anytime if you need my help! But of course, I don't work for free!

relations.description: Choux thinks she is sweet and pretty. She often brings presents when she visits Choux's village.
A strange and arrogant person. Choux will never forgive Rose for bullying Nemunas.
A girl who left after asking Choux to look for someone called Yufine. She wonders what happened.

specialty.name: Hide-and-Seek
specialty.description: No one can find her when she hides in the snow-covered fields.

skills.name: Chop
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a spear before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. A critical hit will double the amount of Focus gained. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Fwoooosh!
skills.description: Attacks the enemy by wildly swinging a spear. Penetrates the enemy's Defense by 50%. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5, consumes all Focus, resetting the cooldown of Fwoooosh! and recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Help Me, Cream!
skills.description: Freezes all enemies before attacking with Cream. Increases Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Freezes all enemies before attacking with Cream. Increases Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 2 turns and grants the caster immunity for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

common.name: Penetrate
common.effect: Ignores the target's Defense when inflicting damage.

skill1.name: つっこめ～!
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、自身のアクションゲージを15.0%UPさせる。クリティカル発生時、【集中】の獲得量が2倍になる。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: くるくるり～ん!
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。対象の防御力を50%貫通する。【集中】が5の場合、【集中】をすべて消費して、【くるくるり～ん!】のスキルターンが0になり、与えたダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
skill2.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃する。対象の防御力を50%貫通する。【集中】が5の場合、【集中】をすべて消費して、【くるくるり～ん!】のスキルターンが0になり、与えたダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill3.name: 助けて!クリーム!
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃する。味方全体にクリティカル抵抗率UPを2ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
